generated_queries: The queries generated by your engine.
If you do all-to-en, you only return the translated article.
If you do all-to-all, or all-to-en-tags, use one string per language / per tag.
If you do embeddings, please return an array of floats which represent your query embedding.
detected_language: You should detect the language of the user query (unless you do embeddings).
suggested_queries: Some of you want to offer the user a better query suggestion / mutliple refined queries to disambiguate the user intent.
You can do this by returning an array of strings here.
